title: Analyze Profitability by Product
description: An FP&A analyst needs to determine which of the company's products are the most and least profitable.

tasks.description: Gather sales revenue and cost of goods sold (COGS) data for each product line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves all necessary financial data.

tasks.description: Calculate the gross profit and gross margin for each product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the profitability metrics for all products.

tasks.description: Create a report ranking the products from most to least profitable based on gross margin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a clear report identifying Product A as most profitable and Product D as least profitable.
